mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM document WHERE created_id = #{userId} AND doc_status = '01'

SELECT d.created_date , doctype.code_detail_name as docTypeName , docstatus.code_detail_name as docStatusName , d.doc_title , d.doc_type , d.doc_status , d.doc_id FROM document d INNER JOIN common_code_detail doctype ON d.doc_type = doctype.code_detail_number AND doctype.code_number = 'APV02' INNER JOIN common_code_detail docstatus ON d.doc_status = docstatus.code_detail_number AND docstatus.code_number = 'APV01' WHERE d.created_id = #{userId} AND d.doc_status = '01' ORDER BY d.created_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM document d WHERE d.created_id = #{userId} AND d.doc_status = '03'

SELECT d.created_date , doctype.code_detail_name as docTypeName , docstatus.code_detail_name as docStatusName , d.doc_title , d.doc_type , d.doc_status , d.doc_id FROM document d INNER JOIN common_code_detail doctype ON d.doc_type = doctype.code_detail_number AND doctype.code_number = 'APV02' INNER JOIN common_code_detail docstatus ON d.doc_status = docstatus.code_detail_number AND docstatus.code_number = 'APV01' WHERE d.created_id = #{userId} AND d.doc_status = '03' ORDER BY d.created_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM document d INNER JOIN approval_step s ON d.doc_id = s.doc_id AND s.approver_id = #{userId} WHERE d.current_approver_id = #{userId} AND s.status = '01'

SELECT d.doc_id , d.doc_title , d.doc_type , doc_status.code_detail_name AS docStatusName , doc_type.code_detail_name AS docTypeName , DATE_FORMAT(d.created_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS createdDate FROM document d INNER JOIN approval_step s ON d.doc_id = s.doc_id AND s.approver_id = #{userId} INNER JOIN common_code_detail doc_type ON d.doc_type = doc_type.code_detail_number AND doc_type.code_number = 'APV02' INNER JOIN common_code_detail doc_status ON d.doc_status = doc_status.code_detail_number AND doc_status.code_number = 'APV01' WHERE d.current_approver_id = #{userId} AND s.status = '01' -- 현재 결재 상태 (대기 중) ORDER BY d.created_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT u.user_id , u.user_name , cd_detail.code_detail_name as employmentStatusName , position_detail.code_detail_name as positionName FROM user u INNER JOIN user o ON u.organization_id = o.organization_id LEFT JOIN common_code_detail cd_detail ON u.employment_status = cd_detail.code_detail_number AND cd_detail.code_number = 'COM04' LEFT JOIN common_code_detail position_detail ON u.position_code = position_detail.code_detail_number AND position_detail.code_number = 'COM02' WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND u.role = '03' AND cd_detail.code_detail_number = '01'

SELECT u.user_id as userId , u.user_name as userName , u.position_code as positionCode , position_detail.code_detail_name as positionName , u.email as email FROM user u LEFT JOIN common_code_detail cd_detail ON u.employment_status = cd_detail.code_detail_number AND cd_detail.code_number = 'COM04' LEFT JOIN common_code_detail position_detail ON u.position_code = position_detail.code_detail_number AND position_detail.code_number = 'COM02' WHERE u.role in ('01', '02')
